page.title: 04A DAY IN MY SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: My name is Rhys Hounslow and I live in Rownhams near Southampton.I live on a housing estate and I go to Rownhams Primary school.I wake up at 07.30 and read till 07.45 I get up and go down stairs to breakfast then I get ready for school.At 08.30 I go to school which begins at 08.45 We go into assembly then afterwards at 09.20 we have work such as English, maths,art or topic. I am in the third year and the age group is from nine years to ten. At 10.30 we have morning play until 10.45 then after play we do some work or PE ( physical exercise). At 12.00 we have lunch and play until 13.15 . We then do more work until 14.15 Play ends at 14.30. After play we do more work until 15.15 when Mr. Bowles reads a story to us.At 15.30 we go home.
